param.name: cache
param.label: Enable Cache
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: show_admin
param.label: Show Admin Panel
param.description: Show admin panel i.e. 'add event' and 'my events' in this module

param.name: modlegend_inccss
param.label: Include Events CSS
param.description: Tells the module if the module Events CSS should be included or not.

param.name: nonjeventsdisable
param.label: Disable on non-JEvents Pages
param.description: Hide the module when displayed on non-JEvents pages

param.name: catid0
param.label: Specified category
param.description: Shows events only from the selected category

param.name: catid1
